org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project

Class ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project.ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    ProjectOperations

    public static final class ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder
extends Object
    The builder for projects operations.

      Adds a project property which should be updated by a new project name after rename or copy of project.

      Creates a new configured CopyOperationImplementation, DeleteOperationImplementation and MoveOrRenameOperationImplementation instance.

    • Method Detail

      • setBuildScriptProperty

        @NonNull
public ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder setBuildScriptProperty(@NonNull
                                                                                  String propertyName)
        Sets the name of property referencing the project build script. If not set the ProjectProperties.BUILD_SCRIPT is used.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the name of property holding the name of project's build script.
        Returns:
        the ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder

      • addCleanTargets

        @NonNull
public ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder addCleanTargets(@NonNull
                                                                           String... cleanTargets)
        Adds build script targets to the list of clean targets. All the added targets are executed before project operation, when no clean target is set the default one "clean" is used.
        Parameters:
        cleanTargets - the clean targets
        Returns:
        the ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder

      • addMetadataFiles

        @NonNull
public ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder addMetadataFiles(@NonNull
                                                                            String... paths)
        Adds additional files to the list of project metadata. The "nbproject" and project build script are already included.
        Parameters:
        paths - the metadata file paths, relative to project directory
        Returns:
        the ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder

      • addDataFiles

        @NonNull
public ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder addDataFiles(@NonNull
                                                                        String... paths)
        Adds additional files to the list of project data files. The source roots, test roots and library definitions are already included.
        Parameters:
        paths - the data file paths, relative to project directory
        Returns:
        the ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder

      • addPreservedPrivateProperties

        @NonNull
public ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder addPreservedPrivateProperties(@NonNull
                                                                                         String... properties)
        Adds private properties which should be retained during copy, move or rename of project.
        Parameters:
        properties - the private properties to be retained
        Returns:
        the ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder

      • addUpdatedNameProperty

        @NonNull
public ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder addUpdatedNameProperty(@NonNull
                                                                                  String propertyName,
                                                                                  @NullAllowed
                                                                                  String propertyPattern,
                                                                                  boolean antName)
        Adds a project property which should be updated by a new project name after rename or copy of project.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the project property name
        propertyPattern - the MessageFormat pattern of the property value, the "{0}" is replaced by the new project name
        antName - when true the project name is converted into Ant friendly name before substitution
        Returns:
        the ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder

      • setCallback

        @NonNull
public ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder setCallback(@NonNull
                                                                       ProjectOperations.Callback callback)
        Sets the project operation callback.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback
        Returns:
        the ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder

      • build

        @NonNull
public DataFilesProviderImplementation build()
        Creates a new configured CopyOperationImplementation, DeleteOperationImplementation and MoveOrRenameOperationImplementation instance.
        Returns:
        the project operations implementation
